TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewRowEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前， 必须为控件中的每一行创建一个对象。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each row in the control. 每次创建控件中的行时都会引发事件 。The event is raised each time a row in the control is created. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程（如将自定义内容添加到行）。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs. 同样，控件中的每一行都必须绑定到数据源中的记录，然后才能 呈现控件。Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the control can be rendered. 当对象) (表示的数据行 绑定到控件中的数据时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when a data row (represented by a object) is bound to data in the control. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程（如修改绑定到行的数据的值）。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递给事件处理方法，该方法允许您访问引发事件的行的属性。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to access the properties of the row that raised the event. 若要访问行中的特定单元，请使用 属性中包含的对象的属性 。To access a specific cell in the row, use the property of the object contained in the property. 您还可以通过使用对象的属性来确定 (标题行、数据行等) 的行类型 。You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the property of the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 传递给事件处理方法的对象访问绑定到数据的行的属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to access the properties of the row being bound to data. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/CS/gridviewrowdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/VB/gridviewrowdataboundvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||参数中包含的对象 `row` 。The object contained in the `row` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取要创建或数据绑定的行。

span.span: Gets the row being created or data-bound.

value.span: 对象，它表示要创建或数据绑定的行。

span.span: A object that represents the row being created or data-bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问正在创建或数据绑定的行的属性。Use the property to access the properties of the row being created or data-bound. 若要访问行中的特定单元，请使用 属性中包含的对象的属性 。To access a specific cell in the row, use the property of the object contained in the property. 您还可以通过使用对象的属性来确定 (标题行、数据行等) 的行类型 。You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问绑定到数据的行的属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the properties of the row being bound to data. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/CS/gridviewrowdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/VB/gridviewrowdataboundvb.aspx#1)]
